name: Stay In Line (Shiftenas)
description:
Welcome to your new test. Your goal, destroy as many robots as you can, without them escaping.

You only have one chance.

You can redirect them as well as destroy them.

How far can you go ?

----

This is my project for the ScoreSpace Game Jam #16 The theme was clone, but there was an issue where some (like me) saw "Tower Defense". So I did both.

The style is really retro, maybe too much, and not really detailed, but it does the job and one round isn't very long. 

My personnal best is 42 btw.
